uk.ac.liv.auction.agent
Class EquilibriumPriceStrategy

java.lang.Object
  uk.ac.liv.auction.agent.AbstractStrategy
      uk.ac.liv.auction.agent.FixedQuantityStrategyImpl
          uk.ac.liv.auction.agent.EquilibriumPriceStrategy
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Cloneable, FixedQuantityStrategy, Strategy, AuctionEventListener, Parameterizable, Prototypeable, Resetable
public class EquilibriumPriceStrategy
extends FixedQuantityStrategyImpl
implements java.io.Serializable, Prototypeable

A strategy which will bid at the true equilibrium price, if profitable, or bid truthfully otherwise. Although this is not a realistic strategy, it can be useful for testing and control experiments.

Version:
$Revision$
Author:
Steve Phelps
See Also:
Serialized Form
